name: DIZT
description:
Ludum Dare 50 entry, theme was "Delay the inevitable".

Synopsis

An experiment goes wrong and you must blast your way through a town filled with zombies!

Gameplay

Top-Down Shooter featuring zombies, cars, and a PSX-style Horror Aesthetic.

Controls

Play the game using a Mouse and Keyboard.

  • Mouse to aim
  • LMB (Left Mouse Button) to shoot
  • WASD or Arrowkeys to move character
  • 1, 2, or Scrollwheel to switch weapon
  • E to enter/exit vehicles
